div.p: This value set includes a smattering of FDI tooth surface codes.
Copyright Statement: This is an example set.
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/FDI-surface defines the following codes:

tr.td: The surface of a tooth that is closest to the midline (middle) of the face.
The chewing surface of posterior teeth.
The biting edge of anterior teeth.
The surface of a tooth that faces away from the midline of the face.
The surface of a posterior tooth facing the cheeks.
The surface of a tooth facing the lips.
The surface of a tooth facing the tongue.
The Mesioclusal surfaces of a tooth.
The Distoclusal surfaces of a tooth.
The Distoincisal surfaces of a tooth.
The Mesioclusodistal surfaces of a tooth.

description.value: This value set includes a smattering of FDI tooth surface codes.

definition.value: The surface of a tooth that is closest to the midline (middle) of the face.
The chewing surface of posterior teeth.
The biting edge of anterior teeth.
The surface of a tooth that faces away from the midline of the face.
The surface of a posterior tooth facing the cheeks.
The surface of a tooth facing the lips.
The surface of a tooth facing the tongue.
The Mesioclusal surfaces of a tooth.
The Distoclusal surfaces of a tooth.
The Distoincisal surfaces of a tooth.
The Mesioclusodistal surfaces of a tooth.
